data.actual_result: The message it put at the bottom of the screen unremoveable until app is restarted. System settings: Android 5.0
data.expected_result: The message is no longer shown.
data.short_description: Messages deleted within 1000ms are not delete, but put at the bottom of the screen becoming unremoveable until the app is restarted.
data.steps_to_repro: - Run a bot command that deletes the trigger (!canRepro)
